    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String encode(String value)
      boolean isSearchable(char c)
      Determines if searching is supported for this character in this encoder. Non-searchable characters are replaced by the EncodedChar for this encoder.
      boolean needsEscape(char c)
      Determines whether this character needs to be preceded by an escape character in this encoder. Typically this just means characters that have a special interpretation by the Lucene query parser. The escape character is specified by EscapeChar and defaults to a backslash. This is the Lucene query parser escape character. Typically this just means characters that have a special interpretation by the Lucene query parser.

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        String encode(String value)
        Parameters:
        value -
        Returns:
        encoded value (not url encoded) to use in constructing the Solr query

      • isSearchable

        boolean isSearchable(char c)
        Determines if searching is supported for this character in this encoder. Non-searchable characters are replaced by the EncodedChar for this encoder.
        Parameters:
        c - character to check
        Returns:
        true if this character is searchable, false otherwise.

      • needsEscape

        boolean needsEscape(char c)
        Determines whether this character needs to be preceded by an escape character in this encoder. Typically this just means characters that have a special interpretation by the Lucene query parser. The escape character is specified by EscapeChar and defaults to a backslash. This is the Lucene query parser escape character. Typically this just means characters that have a special interpretation by the Lucene query parser.
        Parameters:
        c - character to check
        Returns:
        true if this character needs to be escaped, false otherwise.
